cheat.Name: cheat
cheat.Description:
cheat allows you to create and view interactive cheatsheets on the command-line. It was designed to help remind *nix system administrators of options for commands that they use frequently, but not frequently enough to remember.
https://github.com/cheat/cheat

git.Name: git
git.Description:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.
https://git-scm.com/

github-cli.Name: github-cli
github-cli.Description:
GitHub CLI brings GitHub to your terminal. Free and open source.
https://cli.github.com/

jq.Name: jq
jq.Description:
jq is a lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor.
https://stedolan.github.io/jq/

lazygit.Name: lazygit
lazygit.Description:
simple terminal UI for git commands
https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit

neofetch.Name: neofetch
neofetch.Description:
A command-line system information tool written in bash 3.2+
https://github.com/dylanaraps/neofetch

ripgrep.Name: ripgrep
ripgrep.Description:
ripgrep recursively searches directories for a regex pattern while respecting your gitignore
https://github.com/BurntSushi/ripgrep

yq.Name: yq
yq.Description:
a lightweight and portable command-line YAML processor. 
https://mikefarah.gitbook.io/yq/

atuin.Name: atuin
atuin.Description:
Magical Shell History
Atuin replaces your existing shell history with a SQLite database, and records additional context for your commands. Additionally, it provides optional and fully encrypted synchronisation of your history between machines, via an Atuin server.
Tip: toggle between directory, global and host history with CTRL-R
https://atuin.sh

bat.Name: bat
bat.Description:
A cat(1) clone with wings. 

https://github.com/sharkdp/bat

direnv.Name: direnv
direnv.Description:
unclutter your .profile
direnv is an extension for your shell. It augments existing shells with a new feature that can load and unload environment variables depending on the current directory.

https://starship.rs/

starship.Name: starship
starship.Description:
The minimal, blazing-fast, and infinitely customizable prompt for any shell!

https://starship.rs/
